description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Local records; or historical register of remarkable events which have occurred exclusively in the counties of Durham and Northumberland, town and county of Newcastle upon Tyne, and Berwick upon Tweed; with an obituary of persons of talent, eccentricity, and longevity" Author: SYKES, John - Bookseller, of Newcastle-upon-Tyne Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 797.g.26." Page: 96 Place of Publishing: Newcastle Date of Publishing: 1824 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003561435 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
